name: image-evaluation
description: Reference for evaluating AI-generated images and T2I models: benchmarks (PartiPrompt, GenAI-Bench, ImageEval, T2I-CompBench++, HRSBench, RAHF, etc.), metrics (VQAScore, FID, human alignment), dataset scales and links.
description_zh: AI 生成图像与文生图模型评估参考：主流基准（PartiPrompt、GenAI-Bench、ImageEval 等）、指标（VQAScore、FID、人评）及数据集说明与链接。
author: 葱姜蒜
